<h3 id="X31493">X(31493) = CENTROID OF CURVATURES OF THESE CIRCLES: {NINE-POINTS, SPIEKER, STAMMLER}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^4-3*(b^2+c^2)*a^2-4*(b+c)*b*c*a+2*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :
<p>X(31493) lies on these lines:
{1,31245}, {2,496}, {3,2886}, {5,2551}, {6,31488}, {8,31479}, {9,9955}, {10,1482}, {11,11108}, {21,9668}, {30,30478}, {35,31140}, {56,17528}, {115,31490}, {140,2550}, {230,31416}, {381,958}, {382,993}, {405,9669}, {442,999}, {443,15325}, {474,26060}, {486,31485}, {495,6856}, {497,6675}, {499,3925}, {517,5705}, {595,31187}, {936,11230}, {942,5231}, {946,5791}, {956,2476}, {960,18493}, {1001,24387}, {1125,12437}, {1191,24880}, {1329,5055}, {1376,3526}, {1377,13951}, {1378,8976}, {1479,16418}, {1573,13881}, {1574,31489}, {1575,31467}, {1617,10957}, {1698,3057}, {1699,31445}, {1706,11231}, {2975,9655}, {3086,8728}, {3090,3820}, {3242,24160}, {3312,31484}, {3333,3824}, {3419,24541}, {3421,10592}, {3434,7483}, {3436,17530}, {3452,12864}, {3530,31420}, {3534,5267}, {3555,31266}, {3617,7504}, {3622,31254}, {3656,5837}, {3679,11011}, {3695,30741}, {3697,30852}, {3788,20181}, {3813,6767}, {3814,5079}, {3816,16853}, {3822,12513}, {3826,10200}, {3829,16857}, {3843,31458}, {3927,12047}, {3940,11375}, {4299,31157}, {4413,11508}, {4426,15484}, {4847,11374}, {5044,8227}, {5045,25525}, {5054,25440}, {5070,9710}, {5071,8165}, {5084,10593}, {5177,18990}, {5248,11235}, {5251,10896}, {5254,31468}, {5258,10895}, {5259,11238}, {5260,17556}, {5274,16845}, {5288,11237}, {5305,31405}, {5433,16417}, {5436,18527}, {5708,12609}, {5745,12699}, {5779,12608}, {5784,13373}, {5789,6001}, {5794,10246}, {5827,16821}, {6147,24477}, {6244,6833}, {6284,17571}, {6846,7956}, {6857,15171}, {6862,10306}, {6933,17757}, {7373,25466}, {7489,11928}, {7539,29667}, {7680,8158}, {7743,31435}, {7866,17030}, {9605,31466}, {9623,9956}, {9965,11544}, {10202,18251}, {10584,17575}, {10589,17527}, {10916,15934}, {11318,26558}, {12702,26066}, {12953,31159}, {13785,31453}, {13966,31413}, {16466,24892}, {17542,26127}, {19314,31084}, {19875,30323}, {19877,31272}, {21956,31461}, {22793,31424}, {23708,25917}, {24161,29676}</p>
<p>
X(31493) = midpoint of X(30478) and X(31418)<br>
X(31493) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2, 24390, 3295), (2, 31419, 9709)<br>
